echo:CloningModule.NAME: Cloning Module
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, gain #b2 #yecho:Ultimate_Charge.

echo:OverloadedModule.NAME: Overloaded Module
echo:OverloadedModule.FLAVOR: A new equilibrium between energy and charge.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #yPlaceholder #yRelic. Stay #yecho:Charged regardless of #yecho:Ultimate_Charge. Permanently lose 1 [E] .

echo:HolographicTop.NAME: Holographic Top
echo:HolographicTop.FLAVOR: A near-perfect replica that occasionally stops spinning.
